definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle

sentences.english: Ji Shengzi was celebrated for training fighting cock.
sentences.chinese: 纪渻子是有名的斗鸡训练师。

sentences.english: Larry:Maybe we really do have the chance to rebuild Jurassic Park.
sentences.chinese: 也许我们真的有机会重建侏㑩纪公园。

sentences.english: They first appear during the Late Pennsylvanian epoch.
sentences.chinese: 它们首次出现于晚宾夕法尼亚纪。

sentences.english: How many of them are released from Mandos after the First Age?
sentences.chinese: 他们中有多少人在第一纪之后从曼多斯中放出来？

sentences.english: Please submit the filled form with applicant's AYP record book.
sentences.chinese: 请填妥本表格，連同奖勵计划纪錄簿一并递交。

sentences.english: Re-activity of coalfield structure by about E-W directional stretch since Neogene.
sentences.chinese: 新近纪以来近东西向拉张，煤田构造的现代活动。

sentences.english: Classroom discipline is a potential curriculum of peaceful, democratic citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 课堂纪律是一门关于和平与民主公民的课程。

sentences.english: Another ten days passed, the King asked again about the training.
sentences.chinese: 又过了十天，国王又问纪渻子训练得怎样了。

sentences.english: Thinking about this competition, I have to thank Miss Ji.
sentences.chinese: 回想起这次比赛，我需要感谢纪老师。

sentences.english: In the second they escape a flood caused by the end of the Ice Age.
sentences.chinese: 第二部他们逃过了冰川纪后期的大洪水。

sentences.english: The Médoc is situated north of the town of Bordeaux, on the left bank of the Gironde.
sentences.chinese: 梅铎克坐落于波尔多北部，纪隆德和左岸。

sentences.english: He said that we know started in the fifth century BC the sun 3113 years.
sentences.chinese: 他说我们得知第五太阳纪始于公元前3113年。

sentences.english: According to our records, you haven't been to the doctor in two years!
sentences.chinese: 据我们的纪錄，你已经有兩年没看医生了。

sentences.english: However, Neogene of the hedgehog fossils found in Asia, very little.
sentences.chinese: 但新近纪的豪猪化石在亚洲发现得很少。

sentences.english: The Corporation will not discriminate against job applicants with a previous criminal record.
sentences.chinese: 公司不会歧视有刑事纪錄的职位申请人。

sentences.english: Scientists show that fishes and reptiles existed before the age of man.
sentences.chinese: 科学家证明鱼类和爬行类在人类纪之前就已存在。

definition: to approach/to rise high/thick ice/to insult or maltreat
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Xue/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC)
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
surname Zhao/one of the seven states during the Warring States Period (476-220 BC)/the Former Zhao 前趙 (304-329) and Later Zhao 後趙 (319-350), states of the Sixteen Kingdoms
surname Jiang/refers to Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
